publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5930 Aileen Campbell: Scottish Bands Attend South by South West Showcase—That the Parliament congratulates the Scottish bands, including Hudson Mohawk, Frightened Rabbit, We Were Promised Jetpacks, Codeine Velvet Club, Unicorn Kid and Tommy Reilly, attending the South by South West showcase in Austin, Texas, from 17 to 21 March 2010, one of the world’s largest music festivals; welcomes the opportunity for the Scottish bands to attend; wishes them success and exposure at the showcase, and encourages the continued growth of the vibrant and diverse music scene in Scotland.

S3M-5930 Scottish Bands Attend South by South West Showcase (lodged on 10 March 2010) Jamie Hepburn*, Sandra White*, Kenneth Gibson*, Alasdair Allan*, Stewart Maxwell*, Stuart McMillan*, Gil Paterson*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Robin Harper*, Rob Gibson*, Bill Kidd*, Jack McConnell*
